name: Top-Speed Car Chase Racer - Extreme Hot Pursuit: Fast Paced Highway Traffic Racing
name_original: Top-Speed Car Chase Racer - Extreme Hot Pursuit: Fast Paced Highway Traffic Racing
description:
Feel the INTENSITY, the need for SPEED!

The FASTEST and most FURIOUS racing game is now available in the app world!

Buckle up, hit the gas and get ready for the MOST EXHILARATING handheld racing experience!

Feel the rush of no brakes allowed and the best 3D racing. So easy to play, simply tilt your phone to steer left or right. Touch the screen to accelerate the speed.

Intense game ever, feel the rush and need for speed. Download now!

Game Features:
> Game for all ages
> High intensity game
> Cool 3D graphics
